function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Obesity linked to chronic diseases and increased risk of COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and mortality from COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote healthy lifestyle behaviors and access to physical activity","Technologies":"Health education, urban planning for walkable neighborhoods","People":"Individuals with obesity and underlying chronic diseases","Owner":"Health organizations, urban planners"},{"Description":"Built environment correlated with COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Higher COVID-19 mortality in areas with poor health-supporting infrastructure","Mitigation":"Improvement of health infrastructure and health-supporting infrastructure","Technologies":"Urban planning, public health interventions","People":"Residents of areas with poor health-supporting infrastructure","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Sociodemographic factors influence health outcomes","Impact":"Influence on diet, physical activity, and lifestyle, leading to varied health outcomes","Mitigation":"Addressing socioeconomic disparities, promoting education and access to resources","Technologies":"Education initiatives, community support programs","People":"Vulnerable individuals with low education and income","Owner":"Community organizations, government"}]}
